title: A Republican And A Democrat Walk Into a Bar...
teaser: KUOW reporter Ashley Ahearn invited two state senators from Washington state to sit down over a beer and discuss climate change.
contentencoded:
Democrats and Republicans don’t often see eye-to-eye on many issues. The economy, immigration and the environment are among the topics that lead to polarized politics.

Reporter Ashley Ahearn of Here & Now contributor KUOW invited two state senators from Washington state – one Republican and one Democrat – to sit down over a beer to discuss one of the most contentious issues in their legislature: climate change.

  • Read Ashley Ahearn’s full story via KUOW

Reporter

  • Ashley Ahearn, environment reporter at KUOW and part of the multimedia collaborative project EarthFix. She tweets @aahearn.
